name: fat_proc_dwi_to_dt
author: PA Taylor
description: This program fits tensors and DT parameters, as well as the uncertainty of DT parameters needed for tractography.

inputs.description: 4D volume of N DWIs. Required.
inputs.name: Input DWI

inputs.description: Input text file of N gradient vectors or bmatrices.
inputs.name: Gradient Matrix

inputs.description: Set prefix for output DWI data.
inputs.name: Output prefix

inputs.description: Optional, if bvalue information is in a separate file from the b-vectors or matrices.
inputs.name: Bvals

inputs.description: Optional whole brain mask can be input; otherwise, automasking is performed.
inputs.name: Mask

inputs.description: Flag to make a mask using 3dSkullStrip+3dmask_tool from the structural file.
inputs.name: Mask from structural file

inputs.description: Alignment of the output DWI to the REF data set via anatomical reference; a version of the anatomical that has been resampled to match the DWI set.
inputs.name: Resampled anatomical reference

inputs.description: Use another data set to adjust the DWI and subsequent parameter dsets' orientation and origin.
inputs.name: Reference data set

inputs.description: Set prefix for output DTI data; default is 'dt'. Do not include path information here.
inputs.name: DTI Output prefix

inputs.description: Flip the DW gradients in the x-direction.
inputs.name: Flip x

inputs.description: Flip the DW gradients in the y-direction.
inputs.name: Flip y

inputs.description: Flip the DW gradients in the z-direction.
inputs.name: Flip z

inputs.description: Do not flip the DW gradients.
inputs.name: No flip

inputs.description: Turn off scaling of physical length units by 1000 for tensor fitting.
inputs.name: No scale out 1000

inputs.description: Turn off reweighting and refitting of tensors during estimation.
inputs.name: No reweight

inputs.description: Turn off displaying overall weight factors for each gradient.
inputs.name: No cumulative weights

inputs.description: Set threshold for overlay FA volume in QC image.
inputs.name: QC FA threshold

inputs.description: Set cbar max for overlay FA volume in QC image.
inputs.name: QC FA max

inputs.description: Set cbar max for overlay uncertainty (stdev) of FA in QC image.
inputs.name: QC FA uncertainty max

inputs.description: Set cbar max for overlay uncertainty (stdev) of V1 towards V2 direction for DTs in QC image.
inputs.name: QC V12 uncertainty max

inputs.description: Set the prefix of the QC image files separately.
inputs.name: QC Prefix

inputs.description: Turn off generating QC image files.
inputs.name: No QC View

inputs.description: Don't save the command line call of this program and the location where it was run.
inputs.name: No Command Output

inputs.description: Specify a working directory, which can be removed.
inputs.name: Working Directory

inputs.description: Do not remove the working directory.
inputs.name: No Clean

inputs.description: Don't perform uncertainty calculation.
inputs.name: Uncertainty Off

inputs.description: Set the number of Monte Carlo iterations for the uncertainty calculation (default: 300).
inputs.name: Uncertainty Iterations

inputs.description: Extra commands for the uncertainty calculations.
inputs.name: Uncertainty Extra Commands

inputs.description: Help the program push through finding tiny negative values in columns that should contain numbers >=0. Provide a tolerance value VVV.
inputs.name: Check Abs Min

output-files.description: Output files generated with the specified prefix.
output-files.name: Output Files
